name: test_expressjs_is_up
description:
arrange: build and deploy the ExpressJS charm.
    act: call the endpoint.
    assert: the charm should respond with 200 OK.
descriptionHtml:
arrange: build and deploy the ExpressJS charm.
act: call the endpoint.
assert: the charm should respond with 200 OK.
